member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID2
member.summary: The LSA_TRANSLATED_SID2 structure contains that are retrieved based on account names. This structure is used by the function.

member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID2.Use
member.summary: An enumeration value that identifies the use of the SID. If this value is SidTypeUnknown or SidTypeInvalid, the rest of the information in the structure is not valid and should be ignored.

member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID2.Sid
member.summary: The complete SID of the account.

member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID2.DomainIndex
member.summary: The index of an entry in a related data structure which describes the domain that owns the account. If there is no corresponding reference domain for an entry, then DomainIndex will contain a negative value.
